alert.note: Alert for Big Island Interior; Big Island North; Big Island South; Big Island Southeast; Kipahulu; Kohala; Lanai Leeward; Lanai Mauka; Lanai South; Lanai Windward; South Haleakala (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 26 at 3:38PM HST until February 28 at 6:00PM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...TRADE WINDS STRENGTHENING ACROSS THE STATE... .A high far north of the main Hawaiian Islands will drive strengthening trade winds through much of the coming work week. Wind speeds will exceed advisory threshold across many parts of the state and this Wind Advisory may need to be expanded and extended as the week wears on. ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM HST TUESDAY... * WHAT...East winds 25 to 40 mph. * WHERE...Portions of Lanai, Maui and the Big Island. * WHEN...Until 6 PM HST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Winds this strong can tear off shingles, knock down tree branches, blow away tents and awnings and make it difficult to steer, especially for drivers of high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Watch out for falling tree branches when walking or driving. Make sure tents and awnings are secure or take them down. Be prepared for power outages.
